body:
[Tabastan, the Mindful Truant]: There's a tall person standing by the elevator. Unlike the broken elevator, he seem to be in a hurry. 

 [1]: "Hello fellow human, do you know my name or where I am?" 
 [2]: "Were you the one who knocked on my door?" 
 [3]: "I don't think that elevator will work." 
[4] [Leave the person alone]
title: Start1

body:
[Tabastan, the Mindful Truant]: "Maybe I did. Maybe I didn't. What's it to you?" 

[1] "Do you know me?" 
[2] "Do you know where I am?" 
[3] "Okay then, I'll leave you alone." [Leave]
title: Knock

body:
[Tabastan, the Mindful Truant]: "I know." 

[1]: "Can you tell me what's going on?" 
[2]: "I'll leave you alone." [Leave]
title: Elevator

body:
[Tabastan, the Mindful Truant]: "What are you talking about? Are you drunk or something?" 

[1]: "I'm sorry, but I don't know what's going on. I think I lost my memory." 
[2]: "I'm being serious, I don't know where I am. I don't even drink... I think." 
[3]: "I'm the one asking questions here. Can you please answer them?"
title: Hey

body:
[Tabastan, the Mindful Truant]: "Is this some sort of counter prank or something?" 

[1]: "What do you mean by counter prank?" 
[2]: "No. I'm serious"
title: Memory

body:
[Tabastan, the Mindful Truant]: "Look, I was the one who knocked on your door. It was just a prank. Now tell me, did you actually lose your memory?" 

[1]: "Of course, why would I joke about that?" 
[2]: "Nah, I'm just pranking you back you silly." [Leave]
title: CounterPrank

body:
[Tabastan, the Mindful Truant]: "Sorry, but I only know you from sight, not by name. We are in *Newsun Hotel* though." 

[1]: "Newsun...?" 
[2]: "I think I lost my memory."
title: Questions

body:
[Tabastan, the Mindful Truant]: "Yes, Newsun Hotel, at the heart of Moya. It's a place where people come to rest and relax. I'm not sure how you got here, but I'm sure you'll find a way out." 

[Press 1 to Continue]
title: NewsunHotel

body:
[Resonance]: "He's clearly joking with you. You can tell by the way he's smiling." 

[1]: "I lost my memory but I'm not stupid. Can you please not blatantly lie?" 
[2]: "You are not the best liar. If you won't help, at least don't get in my way." [Leave]
title: NewsunCheckPass

body:
[Resonance]: You feel he's telling the truth. (-1 Reason) 

[1]: "Thank you for your help. I think I lost my memory..." 
[2]: "I'll find a way out, don't worry." [Leave]
title: NewsunCheckFail

body:
[Tabastan, the Mindful Truant]: "That can't be good. Are you going to class today, maybe you can go to the nurse's office?" 

[1]: "I'm not going to class, I'm not even sure if I'm a student." 
[2]: "I don't think I'm in the right place for that. What even is this place by the way?" 
[3]: "Why are YOU not in class right now?"
title: Serious

body:
[Tabastan, the Mindful Truant]: "Why would I go to class when I can just stay here? I already know the content." 

[1]: "What do you mean by 'here'?" 
[2]: "Am I a student?"
title: Truant

body:
[Tabastan, the Mindful Truant]: "This is Newsun Hotel, it's a student dormitory. We are on the first floor. You are a student, but I'm not sure which one." 

[1]: "I'm a student?" 
[2]: "I don't think I'm a student. Students usually remember things, right?"
title: Place

body:
[Tabastan, the Mindful Truant]: "Yes, you are a student. That's what you are." 

[1]: "I'm not going to class, I'll se if I can find some help in here." 
[2]: "Okay, thanks for the help!" [Leave]
title: Student

body:
[Tabastan, the Mindful Truant]: "I'm not sure. I think you should go to the nurse's office. Maybe they can help you out." 

[1]: "Okay, I might be a student. One that can't even sign attendance though." 
[2]: "I'll leave you alone, thanks for the help though" [Leave]
title: NotStudent

body:
[Tabastan, the Mindful Truant]: "You could probably speak with *Camellia*, she's the one standing next to the stairs." 

[1]: "Camellia?" 
[2]: "I might just do that, thanks." [Leave]
title: Help

body:
[Tabastan, the Mindful Truant]: "Yeah, the one with the red hair. She's a bit shy, but she's nice and knows her way around." 

[1]: "I'll go talk to her, thanks for the help." [Leave]
title: Camellia

body:
[Tabastan, the Mindful Truant]: Tabastan stands by the elevator, he's not up for talking right now. 

[1]: [Leave him alone]
title: Start2
